data.text: COMING SOON: Saturday, Feb 9 @ 8:30am in Dubai (4:30GMT): Tune in for Keynote Speech by Christine Lagarde at the 4th Annual #ArabFiscalForum, co-hosted by the IMF and the Arab Monetary Fund (AMF) https://t.co/uI8BSgwRki https://t.co/gVA6DxiUQi
